roleset.name: focus on; cause the centerpoint of one entity to align with the centerpoint of another entity

example.name: center-v
example.text: Center the stack of 8 on the other axis
example.amr: (c / center-01 :mode imperative :ARG0 (y / you) :ARG1 (s / stack :size (d / dimension-entity :value 8)) :ARG2 (a / axis :ARG1-of (o / other-01)))

example.name: center-v: normal usage
example.text: Speculation on his successor centers on a number of division heads at the house .

propbank.arg: on a number of division heads at the house

example.amr: (c / center-01 :ARG1 (s / speculate-01 :ARG2 (p / person :ARG0-of (s2 / succeed-02 :ARG1 (h / he)))) :ARG2 (p2 / person :quant (n / number) :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91 :ARG1 (g / government-organization :name (n2 / name :op1 "house")) :ARG2 (h3 / head-01 :ARG1 (d / division)))))

example.name: center-v: around variant
example.text: Japan 's objections to the U.S. plan center around its desire to stay self - sufficient in rice , a staple food , even though foreign producers are far more efficient .

propbank.arg: Japan 's objections to the U.S. plan
around its desire to stay self - sufficient in rice , a staple food , even though foreign producers are far more efficient

example.amr: (c / center-01 :ARG1 (o / object-01 :ARG0 (c2 / country :wiki "Japan" :name (n / name :op1 "Japan")) :ARG1 (t / thing :ARG1-of (p / plan-01 :ARG0 (c3 / country :wiki "United_States" :name (n2 / name :op1 "U.S."))))) :ARG2 (d / desire-01 :ARG0 c2 :ARG1 (s / stay-01 :ARG1 c2 :ARG3 (s2 / suffice-01 :ARG0 (r / rice :domain (f / food :mod (s3 / staple))) :ARG1 c2))) :concession (h / have-degree-91 :ARG1 (o2 / organization :ARG0-of (p2 / produce-01) :mod (f2 / foreign)) :ARG2 (e / efficient-01 :ARG1 o2) :ARG3 (m / more :degree (f3 / far))))

example.name: center-v: in variant
example.text: The size of the cuts is n't known , but they 'll be centered in the exploration and production division , which is responsible for locating oil reserves , drilling wells and pumping crude oil and natural gas .

propbank.arg: in the exploration and production division , which is responsible for locating oil reserves , drilling wells and pumping crude oil and natural gas

example.amr: (c / contrast-01 :ARG1 (k / know-01 :polarity - :ARG1 (h / have-size-91 :ARG1 (t / thing :ARG2-of (c2 / cut-02)))) :ARG2 (c3 / center-01 :ARG1 c2 :ARG2 (d / division :ARG0-of (e / explore-01) :ARG0-of (p / produce-01) :ARG0-of (r / responsible-03 :ARG1 (a / and :op1 (l / locate-01 :ARG0 d :ARG1 (r2 / reserve :pl + :mod (o / oil))) :op2 (d2 / drill-01 :ARG0 d :ARG4 (w / well :pl +)) :op3 (p2 / pump-01 :ARG0 d :ARG2 (a2 / and :op1 (o2 / oil :mod (c4 / crude)) :op2 (g / gas :ARG1-of (n / natural-03)))))))))

example.name: center-v: agentive
example.text: In centering on the disruption of a few proud local customs such as the historic homes tour and the damage to the antiquities , your reporter served to only perpetuate an outdated and stereotypically provincial view of this otherwise thriving port city .

propbank.arg: on the disruption of a few proud local customs such as the historic homes tour and the damage to the antiquities

example.amr: (s / serve-01 :ARG0 (p / person :ARG0-of (r / report-01) :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91 :ARG1 (y / you))) :ARG1 (p2 / perpetuate-01 :ARG0 p :ARG1 (v / view-02 :ARG1 (c / city :ARG1-of (t / thrive-01 :ARG2-of (e / except-01)) :mod (p3 / port)) :ARG2 (t2 / thing :mod (o2 / outdated) :mod (p4 / provincial :ARG1-of (s2 / stereotypic-02 :ARG2 c)))) :mod (o / only)) :manner (c2 / center-01 :ARG0 p :ARG2 (a / and :op1 (d / disrupt-01 :ARG1 (c3 / custom :pl + :quant (f / few) :ARG1-of (l / local-02) :ARG1-of (p5 / pride-01) :example (t3 / tour-01 :ARG1 (h2 / home :pl + :mod (h3 / historic))))) :op2 (d2 / damage-01 :ARG1 (a2 / antiquity :pl +)))))

example.name: center-v: arg2 as location
example.text: The larger parallel after the earthquake centered south of San Francisco is surely with the state of the U.S. economy .
example.amr: (p / parallel-01 :ARG1 (s / state :poss (e / economy :mod (c / country :wiki "United_States" :name (n / name :op1 "U.S.")))) :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91 :ARG2 (l / large) :ARG3 (m / more)) :time (a / after :op1 (e2 / earthquake-01 :ARG1-of (c2 / center-01 :ARG1 (s2 / space :ARG1-of (s3 / south-01 :ARG2 (c3 / city :wiki "San_Francisco" :name (n2 / name :op1 "San" :op2 "Francisco"))))))) :ARG1-of (s4 / sure-02))

example.name: center-v: ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: The current educational mantra is " student centered learning , " and the teacher 's role is extremely important .
example.amr: (a / and :op1 (l / learn-01 :ARG0 s :ARG1-of (c / center-01 :ARG2 (s / student)) :domain (m / mantra :poss (e / educate-01) :time (c2 / current))) :op2 (r / role :ARG2-of (h / have-org-role-91 :ARG0 (p / person :ARG0-of (t / teach-01)) :ARG3 e) :ARG1-of (i2 / important-01 :degree (e2 / extreme))))

example.name: centered-j
example.text: Of course , undeniably , some enforcement departments , which are public security bureau - centered , face the fact that they have insufficient personnel and they have to recruit some " temporary workers . "
example.amr: (d / department :ARG0-of (e / enforce-01) :quant (s / some) :ARG1-of (c / center-01 :ARG2 (b / bureau :ARG0-of (s2 / secure-02 :ARG1 (p / public)))))

roleset.note: CENTER NOTES: Updated for Spatial AMR; part/whole "the center" split off.
CENTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'center' based on sentences in wsj; adjectival 'centered' found in BOLT-7. Member of VNcls focus-87.1. (from center.01-v)
CENTERED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED (from centered.01-j)

example.name: centrist-j: Both args
example.text: he 's accused of being too centerist
